step.datasource: SELECT j.[id] AS LogJobId, NULL AS LogJobStepId, j.[jobname] AS [Name],j.[syscreated],j.[sysmodified],j.[jobgroup], j.[disable], null as [source], null as [target], null as [jobstepseqno] FROM [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_Entity_jobs] j LEFT JOIN [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_LOG_Entity_jobs] lj1 ON j.id = lj1.jobid LEFT JOIN [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_LOG_Entity_jobs] lj2 ON j.id = lj2.jobid AND lj1.id < lj2.id WHERE lj2.id IS NULL AND ( lj1.id IS NULL OR j.[jobname] != lj1.[jobname] OR j.[emailmode] != lj1.[emailmode] OR j.[emailto] != lj1.[emailto] OR j.[emailsubject] != lj1.[emailsubject] OR CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX),j.[emailbody]) != CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX),lj1.[emailbody]) OR j.[disable] != lj1.[disable] OR j.[remarks] != lj1.[remarks] OR j.[settings] != lj1.[settings] OR j.[schedulename] != lj1.[schedulename] OR j.[schedulesettings] != lj1.[schedulesettings] OR j.[syscreated] != lj1.[syscreated] OR j.[sysmodified] != lj1.[sysmodified] OR j.[jobgroup] != lj1.[jobgroup] OR CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), j.[settingsxml] ) != CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), lj1.[settingsxml] )) UNION SELECT js.[jobid] as LogJobId, js.[id] AS LogJobStepId, js.[stepname] AS [Name], js.[syscreated],js.[sysmodified],NULL AS JobGroup,js.[disable],jss.[name] AS [Source],jst.[name] AS [Target],js.[seqno] as [jobstepseqno] FROM [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_Entity_jobsteps] js LEFT JOIN [ABEI].[dbo]._AB_Entity_connections jss on js.source = jss.id LEFT JOIN [ABEI].[dbo]._AB_Entity_connections jst on js.target = jst.id LEFT JOIN [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_LOG_Entity_jobsteps] ljs1 ON js.id = ljs1.jobstepid LEFT JOIN [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_LOG_Entity_jobsteps] ljs2 ON js.id = ljs2.jobstepid AND ljs1.id < ljs2.id WHERE ljs2.id IS NULL AND ( ljs1.id IS NULL OR js.[jobid] != ljs1.[jobid] OR js.[stepname] != ljs1.[stepname] OR js.[Entity] != ljs1.[Entity] OR js.[action] != ljs1.[action] OR js.[source] != ljs1.[source] OR js.[target] != ljs1.[target] OR js.[datasource] != ljs1.[datasource] OR js.[seqno] != ljs1.[seqno] OR js.[disable] != ljs1.[disable] OR js.[mapping] != ljs1.[mapping] OR js.[settings] != ljs1.[settings] OR js.[remarks] != ljs1.[remarks] OR js.[contentbody] != ljs1.[contentbody] OR js.[replace] != ljs1.[replace] OR js.[syscreated] != ljs1.[syscreated] OR js.[sysmodified] != ljs1.[sysmodified] OR CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), js.[settingsxml] ) != CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), ljs1.[settingsxml] ))
step.contentbody:
The following jobs or jobsteps have been changed:

JobId JobStepId Name syscreated sysmodified jobgroup disable source target seqno
%LogJobId% %LogJobStepId% %Name% %syscreated% %sysmodified% %jobgroup% %disable% %source% %target% %jobstepseqno%
 

 

%abeinowiso%

step.datasource:
INSERT INTO [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_LOG_Entity_jobs] ([logdate],[logcomments],[jobid],[jobname],[emailmode],[emailto],[emailsubject],[emailbody],[disable],[remarks],[settings],[schedulename],[schedulesettings],[syscreated],[sysmodified],[jobgroup],[settingsxml]) SELECT GETDATE(), NULL, j.[id],j.[jobname],j.[emailmode],j.[emailto],j.[emailsubject],j.[emailbody],j.[disable],j.[remarks],j.[settings],j.[schedulename],j.[schedulesettings],j.[syscreated],j.[sysmodified],j.[jobgroup],j.[settingsxml] FROM [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_Entity_jobs] j LEFT JOIN [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_LOG_Entity_jobs] lj1 ON j.id = lj1.jobid LEFT JOIN [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_LOG_Entity_jobs] lj2 ON j.id = lj2.jobid AND lj1.id < lj2.id WHERE lj2.id IS NULL AND ( lj1.id IS NULL OR j.[jobname] != lj1.[jobname] OR j.[emailmode] != lj1.[emailmode] OR j.[emailto] != lj1.[emailto] OR j.[emailsubject] != lj1.[emailsubject] OR CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX),j.[emailbody]) != CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX),lj1.[emailbody]) OR j.[disable] != lj1.[disable] OR j.[remarks] != lj1.[remarks] OR j.[settings] != lj1.[settings] OR j.[schedulename] != lj1.[schedulename] OR j.[schedulesettings] != lj1.[schedulesettings] OR j.[syscreated] != lj1.[syscreated] OR j.[sysmodified] != lj1.[sysmodified] OR j.[jobgroup] != lj1.[jobgroup] OR CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), j.[settingsxml] ) != CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), lj1.[settingsxml] ))
INSERT INTO [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_LOG_Entity_jobsteps] ([logdate],[logcomments],[jobstepid],[jobid],[stepname],[Entity],[action],[source],[target],[datasource],[seqno],[disable],[mapping],[settings],[remarks],[contentbody],[replace],[syscreated],[sysmodified],[settingsxml]) SELECT GETDATE(), NULL, js.[id],js.[jobid],js.[stepname],js.[Entity],js.[action],js.[source],js.[target],js.[datasource],js.[seqno],js.[disable],js.[mapping],js.[settings],js.[remarks],js.[contentbody],js.[replace],js.[syscreated],js.[sysmodified],js.[settingsxml] FROM [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_Entity_jobsteps] js LEFT JOIN [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_LOG_Entity_jobsteps] ljs1 ON js.id = ljs1.jobstepid LEFT JOIN [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_LOG_Entity_jobsteps] ljs2 ON js.id = ljs2.jobstepid AND ljs1.id < ljs2.id WHERE ljs2.id IS NULL AND ( ljs1.id IS NULL OR js.[jobid] != ljs1.[jobid] OR js.[stepname] != ljs1.[stepname] OR js.[Entity] != ljs1.[Entity] OR js.[action] != ljs1.[action] OR js.[source] != ljs1.[source] OR js.[target] != ljs1.[target] OR js.[datasource] != ljs1.[datasource] OR js.[seqno] != ljs1.[seqno] OR js.[disable] != ljs1.[disable] OR js.[mapping] != ljs1.[mapping] OR js.[settings] != ljs1.[settings] OR js.[remarks] != ljs1.[remarks] OR js.[contentbody] != ljs1.[contentbody] OR js.[replace] != ljs1.[replace] OR js.[syscreated] != ljs1.[syscreated] OR js.[sysmodified] != ljs1.[sysmodified] OR CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), js.[settingsxml] ) != CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX), ljs1.[settingsxml] ))

INSERT INTO [dbo]._ST_LOG_ABEI_Results (logid, runid, jobid, jobstepid, TargetDB, Entity, KeyValue, HeaderId, RecordValue, Property, Action, ValueString, rowstatus, errormessage, sequenceno, syscreated) SELECT id as logid, runid, jobid, jobstepid, TargetDB, Entity, KeyValue, HeaderId, RecordValue, Property, Action, ValueString, rowstatus, errormessage, sequenceno, syscreated FROM [abei].[dbo].[_AB_Entity_results_log] l WHERE l.rowstatus = -1 and l.targetDB = '400' and l.id not in (SELECT logid from [dbo]._ST_LOG_ABEI_Results)

select 6024 as Type, GETDATE() as StartDate, '11D37ADF-7532-4218-B7ED-0848FD25A441' AS CustomerId, 0 as EmpId, 'Error on job ' + CONVERT(varchar, r.jobid) as Description, 'Lennart Meeuse' AS FreeTextField_01,'Lennart Meeuse' AS FreeTextField_02,'Lennart Meeuse' AS FreeTextField_04, 'ABEI Job failure' AS FreeTextField_05, 1 as FreeBoolField_01, 1 AS Priority, 'Job ' + CONVERT(varchar, r.jobid) + ': ' + j.jobname + ' JobStep: ' + CONVERT(varchar, MIN(r.jobstepid)) + ' On: ' + CONVERT(varchar, MIN(r.syscreated)) + ' Error: ' + MAX(ISNULL(r.errormessage,'')) AS RequestComments from _ST_LOG_ABEI_Results r inner join _AB_Entity_jobs j on j.id = r.jobid where jobid NOT IN( 330,332,499 )-- Unknown status, therefore set to assumed failed AND CONVERT(date,logdate) = CONVERT(date, GETDATE()) group by jobid, jobname
